Text:
Ready to test your#Apprenticeshipknowledge?For#NAW2025Employer Tuesday, four incredible apprenticeship advocates take on our National Apprenticeship Week quiz. 

Who will be crowned champion?Watch now:National Apprenticeship Week 2025 | City & Guilds

New episode!How can#apprenticeshipswiden participation & reach those who need skills funding most? Join@BryonyKingslandwith guests for funding reform & Functional Skills insights.#NAW2025Listen now:https://ow.ly/Wr3150V03Yr
Great to be celebrating#NAW2025!What a brilliant video showcasing the breadth and depth of apprenticeships and fantastic to see some of our#Gen2apprentices included.#SkillsForLife

On this#NAW2025and#EmployerTuesday, explore some of the incredible employers who have received the#PrincessRoyalTrainingAwardsstandard for their apprenticeship programmes!https://princessroyaltrainingawards.com/recipients/

Some of our apprentices visited the House of Commons today for the@FEWeek&@AELPUKATC Apprenticeship Awards Parliamentary Reception, alongside our Executive Director,@TweetFaiza, who spoke about our ongoing partnership to champion apprenticeships and training.#NAW2025(1/3)

We were honoured to welcome representatives from the Abu Dhabi Accountability Authority (ADAA) to formalise their recognition as an ILM Approved Centre, allowing them to deliver globally recognised qualifications in the region.

It's#NationalProductivityWeek!

In a recent webinar with@LifeLong_Ed, hear from@K_DonnellyCEOon what is next for Skills, Productivity and Growth.

Read our#ProductivityWeekarticle here:https://cityandguilds.com/news/january-2025/national-productivity-week…

Congratulations to former@cityandguildslearner Alan Titchmarsh!We’re thrilled to see Alan awarded a CBE in the 2025 New Year Honours List for his incredible services to horticulture and charity.#Congratulations#SkillsChangeLives

It was inspiring to hear from the Rt Hon Baroness@Jacqui_Smith1,@andrewpakes_,@NeilDotObrien, and the Rt Hon Sir Lindsay Hoyle,@CommonsSpeaker, on the importance of apprenticeships and the achievements of the brilliant apprentices in the room.#NAW2025#SkillsForLife(3/3)
“Attitudes towards apprenticeships are changing, but the latest figures for UK apprenticeships show that there is no room for complacency." -@K_DonnellyCEO

We believe that#skillsare the new global currency.We’re excited to announce that#CityAndGuildsis the Lead Expert Partner for a new report series from@hundo_xyz.

Find out more and register here to be the first to read the inaugural reporthttps://cityandguilds.com/what-we-offer/employers/skills-the-new-global-currency?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=hundo-announcement-x-organic…

Join City & Guilds CEO@K_DonnellyCEOin conversation with@LifeLong_Edabout what's next for Skills, Productivity and Growth.16th January, 10am, Online 

Register here:https://ow.ly/GPtZ50UAZ6gRead our#MakingSkillsWorkreport here:https://ow.ly/wEXO50UAZ6h

Did you know that one-fifth of the world's population will celebrate Lunar New Year?

This global celebration begins on Wednesday, 29 January, marking the Year of the Snake!Wishing everyone a vibrant and fulfilling year ahead!

City & Guilds is proud to sponsor four of these awards, and it was fantastic to celebrate the national finalists today, as well as some of the outstanding apprenticeship provision across the sector.#NAW2025#SkillsForLife(2/3)
We are delighted to be partnering with ADAA on this exciting journey and look forward to supporting them in delivering high-quality leadership and management qualifications.

Introducing the Local Community Skills FundThe Local Community Skills Fund aims to provide grants for local projects to empower communities across the UK to deliver the skills they need locally.

Now open for applications: find out more herehttps://cityandguildsfoundation.org/what-we-offer/funding/local-community-skills-fund/…
Great to have you, Michael!
Great work, Sophie!
Great post, thanks for sharing!

Happy St David’s Day!Today, our colleagues@AngharadCandG, Sian Beddis, and Andrew Marubbi share the skills development themes they’re most passionate about and committed to driving forward in Wales.#StDavidsDay#Wales#SkillsDevelopment

It's fantastic to see@SalfordSCCGrouprecognised for their outstanding employer engagement. This is a crucial aspect of providing relevant and effective education. 
Congratulations!#CollegesWeek2025#AoCBeacons
Wishing everyone celebrating a peaceful and blessed Ramadan a month filled with reflection, joy, and prosperity.#RamadanMubarak

We’d like to wish chef, presenter, author, and former@cityandguildscatering learner@AinsleyFoodsa very happy birthday!Our CEO,@K_DonnellyCEO, caught up with Ainsley to reflect on his time at college.

Watch it here:https://cityandguilds.com/about-us/inspire…#SkillsChangeLives

We’re delighted to announce the launch of ‘Skills: The New Global Currency?’ – a new report from hundoLAB, with City & Guilds as Lead Expert Partner. 

Download the report today:https://ow.ly/v5tM50VeF0R@hundo_xyz#Skills
Thank you so much for attending!

It's crucial to recognise the vital link between traditional craftsmanship, heritage preservation, and the thriving creative industries. 
We're proud to support discussions that explore how these skills are nurtured and passed on to future generations.
It's crucial to empower individuals to unlock their potential and take the next step in their careers. We're proud to be included among the organisations supporting this important initiative.

The 2025#NeurodiversityIndex Report is here!In an era where inclusivity has become a cornerstone of organisational success, championing and supporting neurodiversity in the workplace is more important than ever.  

Read the full report herehttps://cityandguildsfoundation.org/what-we-offer/campaigning/neurodiversity-index/…
Thank you so much for attending and supporting our mission to drive growth through skills! We're proud to be a voice for skills#SkillsChangeLives

From City & Guilds qualification to celebrity fashion designer!@KarenMillen_OBEdemonstrates that skills can be developed anywhere. 

Share how skills have impacted your own career using#MySkillsStoryWatch the full interviews herehttps://cityandguilds.com/about-us/inspire…
